Html:
Hi radioman and everyone who can make an advise or support.


I am new in development and windows mobile and c#.

I have VS2010 and  VS2010Espress for Windows phone.

Reading your previous posts and discussions  I found that to have GmapControl in my Toolbox i have to

1. build Demo.WindowsMobile.csproj to get .dll
2. Add this .dll to my toolbox

So as you already understood I can't do this.

If it is possible please provide step by step instructions to get this control.

Thanks in advance

By the way
Great work is done)))))
Windows Mobile is for Windows Mobile, not for phone, you have to use VS2008

Thanks for your answer.
As I know windows mobile is windows phone after version 6.5 so, if I understood you, this means that i can't develop any app with windows phone 7x.
